## A 1 
###a)

```{r}
gv <- runif(10000,min=0,max=1)
lambda <- 3
invexp <- -(1/lambda)*log(gv)
exp <- rexp(10000,lambda)

invpois = NULL
for (i in 1:10000){
j <- 0
U <- runif(1,0,1)
Y <- -(1/lambda)*log(U)
sum <- Y
while(sum < 1){
U <-  runif(1,min = 0,max = 1) 
Y <- -(1/lambda)*log(U)
sum <-  sum + Y
j <-  j + 1; 
}
invpois <- rbind(invpois,j)
}

pois <-  rpois(10000,lambda)

par(mfrow=c(1,2))

hist(invexp)
hist(exp)

hist(invpois)
hist(pois)

qqplot(invexp,exp)
qqplot(invpois,pois)
```

###b)

```{r}
u <- runif(10000,0,1)
v <- runif(10000,0,1)

bmnorm = cos(2*pi*u)*sqrt(-log(v))
norm <- rnorm(10000)

par(mfrow=c(1,2))
hist(bmnorm)
hist(norm)
qqplot(bmnorm,norm)
```
